text: Nouri Kamil Mohammed Hasan al-Maliki (born 20 June 1950) is an Iraqi politician. He was the Prime minister of Iraq from May 2006Flexing Muscle, Baghdad Detains U.S. Contractors The New York Times, 16 January 2012. Foreign Affairs, 31 January 2012. to August 2014. His predecessor was Ibrahim al- Jaafari. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Iraq Category:Vice presidents of Iraq
title: Nouri al-Maliki
